Experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
Experience.description:
• Took the lead on implementing intelligent monitoring of the Walmart Self-Checkout application, using Dynatrace, to automate the process of identifying issues in the application.

• Worked on the self-checkout Age-check feature of the application using Android Kotlin. Helped implement usage analytics for Walmart stores across the United States in Dynatrace, handling over 9 million requests per month.
• Developed visualization to measure performance metrics of different versions of the application to help increase efficiency and optimize application performance at each view using USQL.
• Developed a view in React Native mini-app for Walmart POS app.
